acceptanceCriteria: The Header component displays the new logo image from the uploaded files
The logo maintains its circular shape and responsive sizing
The logo is clickable and maintains existing navigation behavior
The visual style matches the uploaded design with silver/metallic finish on black background

Maintain the existing circular shape styling, responsive sizing classes (h-12 w-12), and clickable navigation behavior with smooth scroll to top functionality.

requirements.summary: Update any logo references in the selected page elements to use the new uploaded logo design if they reference the logo image
acceptanceCriteria: All selected elements that reference the logo image are updated to use the new design

Review the HeroBanner component for any logo image references in the hero section container or call-to-action button elements. If found, update them to use frontend/public/assets/generated/karthikeyan-logo.dim_200x200.png to maintain visual consistency.
